title: Do these photos prove Bachelor frontrunner DOESN'T win Angie Kent's heart?
text:
The flamboyant Brit has charmed Angie Kent on this season of The Bachelorette.

But revealing photos appear to prove that frontrunner Ciarran Stott failed to win the former Gogglebox star's heart.

He was pictured enjoying a night out with a brunette at a Gold Coast nightclub at the weekend, before being tagged in a picture by another woman.

Flamboyant! Photos appear to prove that Bachelorette frontrunner Ciarran Stott (pictured) fails to win former Gogglebox star Angie Kent's heart

While he is still on screen on the dating series, Ciarran is clearly enjoying his newfound fame.

His outing seemingly signalled that he fails to make it to the end of the show.

On Instagram, he was tagged in a photo from a night out at Sin City nightclub in Queensland over the weekend.

Sitting next to a mystery brunette in the photograph, Ciarran was clearly enjoying his freedom from the Bachelorette mansion.

But in the comments, Bachelorette fans were left disappointed after spotting the spoiler on social media.

Spoiler alert! Bachy fans were left disappointed after spotting the picture of Ciarran on social media

End of the road: Ciarran was tagged in a photo on Instagram from a night out at Sin City nightclub in Queensland over the weekend

One Instagram user wrote: 'Well clearly he doesn’t win hahaha accidentally just spoiled The Bachelorette for everyone.'

And another commented: 'Clearly he doesn't win The Bachelorette.'

But it wasn't the only revealing photo Ciarran has been tagged in this week.

'Date night' An Instagram user sparked questions over whether Ciarran has found a new beau

Another post by an Instagram user from Brisbane sparked questions over whether Ciarran impressed Angie enough to win the show.

On Tuesday, the mystery woman shared a photo of herself dressed up in a white frock followed by a picture of a grinning Ciarran, seemingly holding onto her hand.

She captioned her pictures 'date night' alongside the rose emoji, sparking questions from excited followers.

The fan revealed to Daily Mail Australia that she met Ciarran at a bar in Queensland.

She said: 'Apart from being drop dead gorgeous, he was such a lovely, genuine, down to earth guy.'

Smile! She shared a photo of herself dressed up in a white frock followed by a picture of a grinning Ciarran (pictured) seemingly holding onto her hand

It comes after Ciarran was pictured cosying up to his on-again off-again ex-girlfriend Renee Barrett in Bali.

In one of the photographs, Ciarran is seen getting close to Renee, who starred on Matt Agnew's season of The Bachelor, over a romantic dinner in Bali.

In another picture, Ciarran is seen posing alongside Renee and a group of friends as they enjoyed a group trip to the Indonesian island.
description: The flamboyant Brit has charmed Angie Kent on this season of The Bachelorette. But revealing photos appear to prove that frontrunner Ciarran Stott failed to win the Gogglebox star's heart.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
